class.name: TileSetScenesCollectionSource
class.brief_description: Exposes a set of scenes as tiles for a [TileSet] resource.
class.description: When placed on a [TileMap], tiles from [TileSetScenesCollectionSource] will automatically instantiate an associated scene at the cell's position in the TileMap. Scenes are instantiated as children of the [TileMap] when it enters the tree. If you add/remove a scene tile in the [TileMap] that is already inside the tree, the [TileMap] will automatically instantiate/free the scene accordingly.

method.name: create_scene_tile
method.description: Creates a scene-based tile out of the given scene. Returns a newly generated unique ID.

method.name: get_next_scene_tile_id
method.description: Returns the scene ID a following call to [method create_scene_tile] would return.

method.name: get_scene_tile_display_placeholder
method.description: Returns whether the scene tile with id [code]id[/code] displays a placeholder in the editor.

method.name: get_scene_tile_id
method.description: Returns the scene tile ID of the scene tile at index [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_scene_tile_scene
method.description: Returns the [PackedScene] resource of scene tile with id [code]id[/code].

method.name: get_scene_tiles_count
method.description: Returns the number or scene tiles this TileSet source has.

method.name: has_scene_tile_id
method.description: Returns whether this TileSet source has a scene tile with id [code]id[/code].

method.name: remove_scene_tile
method.description: Remove the scene tile with id [code]id[/code].

method.name: set_scene_tile_display_placeholder
method.description: Sets whether or not the scene tile with id [code]id[/code] should display a placeholder in the editor. This might be useful for scenes that are not visible.

method.name: set_scene_tile_id
method.description: Changes a scene tile's ID from [code]id[/code] to [code]new_id[/code]. This will fail if there is already a tile with a ID equal to [code]new_id[/code].

method.name: set_scene_tile_scene
method.description: Assigns a [PackedScene] resource to the scene tile with id [code]id[/code]. This will fail if the scene does not extend CanvasItem, as positioning properties are needed to place the scene on the TileMap.
